tools.name: Figma
tools.description: A collaborative interface design tool that lets teams design, prototype, and collect feedback in a single platform.

tools.name: Jira
tools.description: Project management tool that allows agile teams to plan, track, and manage their work.

tools.name: Miro
tools.description: Online collaborative whiteboard platform perfect for brainstorming, planning, and team collaboration.

tools.name: ProductBoard
tools.description: Product management system that helps teams understand what users need, prioritize what to build, and rally everyone around the roadmap.

tools.name: Maze
tools.description: Rapid testing platform that helps teams collect and analyze user testing feedback.

tools.name: Notion
tools.description: All-in-one workspace for notes, documents, wikis, and project management.

tools.name: GitHub
tools.description: Version control and collaboration platform for software development and project management.

tools.name: Amplitude
tools.description: Product analytics platform that helps teams build better products through data-driven insights.

tools.name: Typeform
tools.description: Online form and survey platform that creates conversational data collection experiences.

tools.name: Linear
tools.description: Issue tracking and project management tool built for high-performance teams.

tools.name: Confluence
tools.description: Content collaboration software that helps teams create, organize, and collaborate on work.

tools.name: Hotjar
tools.description: Behavior analytics software that helps understand how users interact with your product.

tools.name: Replit
tools.description: Replit is an online development environment that allows users to write, compile, and run code in various programming languages.

tools.name: Adobe Podcast
tools.description: Adobe Podcast is a tool designed for creating professional podcasts, offering advanced features for audio editing and production.

tools.name: V0
tools.description: V0 is a platform that simplifies building and deploying serverless applications using a simple API and workflow.

tools.name: Bolt.New
tools.description: Bolt.New is a tool that enables developers to rapidly prototype web applications with a focus on simplicity and speed.

tools.name: Lovable
tools.description: Lovable is a tool designed to help teams deliver better product experiences with user feedback, insights, and collaboration.

tools.name: Smartsheet
tools.description: Smartsheet is a platform for work management and automation, enabling teams to collaborate and manage projects, processes, and work in real-time.

tools.name: Jira Product Discovery
tools.description: Jira Product Discovery is a tool to help product managers capture, prioritize, and validate ideas with their teams, transforming them into actionable product roadmaps.

tools.name: Balsamiq
tools.description: Balsamiq is a rapid wireframing tool that helps you design user interfaces with low-fidelity mockups to visualize ideas and get feedback early.

tools.name: Semrush
tools.description: Semrush is an all-in-one marketing toolkit for digital marketing professionals, offering tools for SEO, PPC, content, social media, and competitive research.

tools.name: Ahrefs
tools.description: Ahrefs is an advanced SEO toolset for growing search traffic, researching competitors, and monitoring your niche. It provides detailed backlinks, keyword research, and SEO audit tools.

tools.name: Canva
tools.description: Canva is a graphic design platform that allows users to create social media posts, presentations, posters, documents, and other visual content with an easy-to-use drag-and-drop interface.

tools.name: LucidChart
tools.description: LucidChart is an online diagramming and flowchart software that helps teams to visualize processes, systems, and organizational structures with easy-to-use collaboration tools.

tools.name: IFTTT
tools.description: IFTTT (If This Then That) is a web-based service that allows users to create conditional statements and automate tasks between various online services and devices.

tools.name: Zapier
tools.description: Zapier is an online automation tool that connects your favorite apps and services to automate repetitive tasks without coding or relying on developers to build the integration.

tools.name: Formstack
tools.description: Formstack is a powerful form builder that helps businesses create online forms, surveys, and workflows to collect data and automate processes without needing to code.

tools.name: JotForm
tools.description: JotForm is an easy-to-use online form builder that allows users to create custom forms for a variety of purposes, including surveys, registrations, and data collection.

tools.name: Zoho Forms
tools.description: Zoho Forms is an online form builder that allows users to create forms, collect data, and automate workflows with powerful integrations and analytics.

tools.name: Power BI
tools.description: Power BI is a business analytics tool from Microsoft that helps organizations visualize their data, share insights, and make data-driven decisions.

tools.name: Tableau
tools.description: Tableau is a powerful data visualization tool that helps users analyze and visualize their data with interactive dashboards and reports.

tools.name: Power Automate
tools.description: Power Automate is a Microsoft service that helps automate workflows between apps and services, streamlining tasks and processes.

tools.name: Google Analytics
tools.description: Google Analytics is a web analytics service that provides detailed statistics and insights about the traffic and performance of websites.

tools.name: Zoho Mail Domain Details
tools.description: Zoho Mail Domain Details provides information about domain configurations for email setup.

tools.name: MockAPI
tools.description: MockAPI lets you easily create mock APIs for development and testing.

tools.name: CodePen
tools.description: CodePen is an online community for testing and showcasing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript snippets.

tools.name: ngrok
tools.description: ngrok exposes local servers to the internet, making it easy to test webhooks and APIs.

tools.name: Gitpod
tools.description: Gitpod provides ready-to-code development environments in your browser. It automates the setup, so you can start coding immediately.

tools.name: Qwen
tools.description: Qwen is a large language model developed by Alibaba Cloud. It is designed for various natural language processing tasks, including text generation, translation, and question answering.

tools.name: DeepSeek
tools.description: DeepSeek is a company focused on developing advanced AI models, particularly in the areas of large language models and code generation. They offer various models and tools for developers and researchers.

tools.name: Meta AI
tools.description: Meta AI is Meta's research division dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence. They work on a wide range of AI topics, including large language models, computer vision, and machine learning, and often release open-source tools and models.

tools.name: NotebookLM
tools.description: NotebookLM is an AI-powered research assistant that helps you synthesize information from multiple sources, understand complex topics, and generate new ideas.

tools.name: Cloudflare Workers
tools.description: Cloudflare Workers is a serverless platform that lets you run your code (JavaScript, WebAssembly, and more) on Cloudflare's edge network.  This allows you to build fast, scalable, and reliable applications and APIs without managing servers.

tools.name: Storyblok
tools.description: Storyblok is a headless CMS that helps businesses create and scale standout content experiences. It speeds up content creation workflows for all teams.

tools.name: Storybook
tools.description: Storybook is an open source tool for developing UI components in isolation. It makes it easy to visualize different states of your components and test them interactively.

tools.name: Claude
tools.description: Claude is an AI assistant built by Anthropic, designed for conversations, search, and coding. It aims to be helpful, harmless, and honest.

tools.name: ChatGPT
tools.description: ChatGPT is a large language model created by OpenAI. It's designed for conversational interactions, generating text, translating languages, writing different kinds of creative content, and answering your questions in an informative way.

tools.name: Google Gemini
tools.description: Google Gemini is a family of highly capable multimodal models. Gemini is optimized for different modalities, including text, code, images, audio, and video.

tools.name: Parcel
tools.description: Parcel is a zero configuration bundler for web applications.

tools.name: Unsplash
tools.description: Unsplash is a platform for high-quality, free-to-use photos.
